    body:
        achieve_once inhand(shirt)
        # Temporarily hold the shirt
        achieve inside(shirt, sink)
        # Place the shirt inside the sink
        if exists faucet: item : is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink):
            # Check if there is a faucet next to the sink

            achieve_once is_on(faucet)

            achieve_once is_off(faucet)
            # Turn off the faucet after washing

def plugged_in_ironing_board():
    # Determine whether the ironing board has an iron plugged in
    symbol plugged_in=exists iron: item : is_iron(iron) and plugged(iron)
    return plugged_in

behavior prepare_ironing():
    body:
        bind iron: item where:
            is_iron(iron)
        # Select an iron for the task
        
        if not plugged_in_ironing_board():
            # Ensure the iron is plugged in if not already
            achieve plugged(iron)
            
        achieve is_on(iron)
        # Turn on the iron after plugging it in

behavior iron_shirt(shirt:item):
    body:
        bind ironing_board: item where:
            is_ironing_board(ironing_board)
        # Select an ironing board for use

        achieve inside(shirt, ironing_board)
        # Place the shirt on the ironing board
        prepare_ironing()
        # Perform the necessary preparations for ironing
        # Ironing action implicitly occurs by achieving these states

behavior clean_up_ironing():
    body:
        bind iron: item where:
            is_iron(iron)
        # Select an iron for cleanup
        
        achieve is_off(iron)
        # Turn off the iron after use

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and clean(shirt)
        # Select a clean shirt for ironing
        
        iron_shirt(shirt)
        clean_up_ironing()

behavior turn_on_iron(iron:item):
